entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
